live_updates: We are monitoring multiple areas offline due to loss of power. Please see BC Hydro updates at https://www.bchydro.com/power-outages/app/outage-list.html
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
43326.summary: Some customers in Vancouver Island & BC Lower Mainland are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services due to storm weather and Hydro related challenges. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
43326.title: Oct 24 – Vancouver Island & BC Lower Mainland | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.

43325.title: Oct 24– Winnipeg ( Rossmere and East Kildonan) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
